# Villa Lily Blue

> Luxury vacation villa rental in Anse Marcel, Saint Martin (French Caribbean)

## Property Overview

Villa Lily Blue is a spacious and elegant luxury villa located on the heights of Anse Marcel, one of the most beautiful bays in Saint Martin. The property offers stunning panoramic sea views of the Caribbean Sea.

- Type: Vacation rental villa
- Location: Anse Marcel, Saint Martin 97150 (French side)
- Capacity: 8 guests
- Bedrooms: 4 (all with en-suite bathrooms)
- Bathrooms: 5
- Surface: 250 m² / 2,700 sq ft
- Rating: 5.0/5 on Airbnb (15 reviews)
- Renovated: 2024 (fully renovated)

## Key Features

- Heated private pool (10x5m / 33x16ft)
- Panoramic sea views from the terrace
- Super king beds (2m wide) in all bedrooms
- Fully equipped modern kitchen
- Outdoor kitchen & BBQ for sunset dining
- Air conditioning in all rooms
- 100 Mbps fiber WiFi
- Private fitness room
- Tropical garden
- Private parking (up to 6 vehicles)
- Safe

## Bedrooms

1. Master Suite: Super king bed (2m wide), en-suite bathroom, sea view, terrace access
2. Bedroom 2: Super king bed (2m wide), en-suite bathroom, sea view, pool access
3. Bedroom 3: Super king bed (2m wide), en-suite bathroom, sea view, pool access
4. Bedroom 4: Queen bed (160 cm), en-suite bathroom, direct pool access

## Booking

- Minimum stay: 5 to 7 nights depending on the season
- Rate includes: End-of-stay cleaning, linens, towels, beach towels, WiFi, personal welcome, local taxes
- Contact us for a personalized quote

## Location & Distances

- Anse Marcel Beach: 5 minutes by car
- Anse Marcel Marina: 5 minutes
- Grand Case (culinary capital): 10 minutes
- Marigot (French capital): 15 minutes
- Orient Bay: 20 minutes
- Princess Juliana Airport (SXM): 25 minutes
- GPS coordinates: 18.1097, -63.0319

## Concierge Services (available on request)

- Private chef / catering
- Airport VIP transfer
- Car rental delivered to villa
- Private chauffeur
- Boat excursions (Anguilla, Saint Barth, Tintamarre)
- Diving and snorkeling
- In-home massage and yoga
- Babysitting
- Private event organization

## Booking & Contact

- Website: https://villalilyblue.com
- Email: contact@villalilyblue.com
- Airbnb: https://www.airbnb.fr/rooms/1313868121596013747
- Contact us for rates and availability

## About Saint Martin

Saint Martin is a unique island shared between France (north) and the Netherlands (Sint Maarten, south). Known as the "Culinary Capital of the Caribbean," the island offers 37 beaches, duty-free shopping, and rich cultural diversity on just 87 km².
